sentences.en: An enlargement is often made from a small photograph.
sentences.cn: 大照片常由小照片放大而成.

sentences.en: At the onset of germination, the hypocotyl elongates rapidly by cell enlargement.
sentences.cn: 萌发开始时, 下胚轴依靠细胞增大而迅速伸长.

sentences.en: Chronic enlargement of the gland occurs with tumors.
sentences.cn: 腺体慢性肿大的起因是肿瘤.

sentences.en: Development's only cheaper when you are doing a lot of enlargement.
sentences.cn: 如果你要放大的照片数量大,冲洗费只会更便宜.

sentences.en: Firm liver enlargement and biochemical evidence of intrahepatic cholestasis are typical manifestations.
sentences.cn: 肝硬而肿大和肝内胆汁淤沸的生化改变是典型现象.

sentences.en: In this enlargement, barley, alfalfa, and sugar beets can be differentiated.
sentences.cn: 在这张放大的照片上, 大麦, 苜蓿和甜菜都能被区分开.

sentences.en: Job enrichment should be distinguished from job enlargement.
sentences.cn: 工作丰富化和工作扩大化应加以区分.

sentences.en: Lymph node enlargement occurs early in chronic lymphocytic leukemia.
sentences.cn: 慢性淋巴细胞性白血病,出现淋巴结肿大较早.

sentences.en: Mother wrote to her son for an enlargement of his baby's photograph.
sentences.cn: 母亲给儿子写信要他寄一张他婴儿的放大照片.

sentences.en: Parotid enlargement has previously been described in patients receiving clozapine.
sentences.cn: 以往曾有接受氯氮平治疗引起腮腺肿大的报告.

sentences.en: Proliferation of lymphocytes in lacrimal and salivary glands may cause bilateral painless enlargement.
sentences.cn: 泪腺和唾液腺淋巴细胞增生,可引起两侧腺体无痛性肿大.

sentences.en: The chest X - rays showed moderate enlargement of the heart.
sentences.cn: 胸部 X 光片显示出心脏稍有扩大.

sentences.en: The enlargement brings out the details in the photograph.
sentences.cn: 照片放大后细微之处都很清楚.

sentences.en: the enlargement of the company's overseas business activities
Thymic enlargement may occasionally persist in normal children until the age of about six years.
sentences.cn: 正常儿童,胸腺增大偶尔可以保持到六岁左右.

words.tran_cn: [摄] 放大机；扩大者；增补者

trans.tran_cn: 放大，放大物，放大的照片
trans.tran_en: a photograph that has been printed again in a bigger size
